trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: Get-Job
trans-unit.target: 取得工作

trans-unit.source: Get-Job
trans-unit.target: 取得工作

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Gets Windows PowerShell background jobs that are running in the current session.
trans-unit.target: 取得正在目前工作階段中執行的 Windows PowerShell 背景工作。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: SessionIdParameterSet (Default)
trans-unit.target: SessionIdParameterSet （預設值）

trans-unit.source: CommandParameterSet
trans-unit.target: CommandParameterSet

trans-unit.source: StateParameterSet
trans-unit.target: StateParameterSet

trans-unit.source: InstanceIdParameterSet
trans-unit.target: InstanceIdParameterSet

trans-unit.source: NameParameterSet
trans-unit.target: NameParameterSet

trans-unit.source: FilterParameterSet
trans-unit.target: FilterParameterSet

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The **Get-Job** cmdlet gets objects that represent the background jobs that were started in the current session.
trans-unit.target: **Get-job** cmdlet 會取得代表目前的工作階段中啟動的背景工作的物件。

trans-unit.source: You can use **Get-Job** to get jobs that were started by using the Start-Job cmdlet, or by using the **AsJob** parameter of any cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 **Get-job** 以取得使用 Start-job cmdlet，或使用啟動的工作 **AsJob** 任何 cmdlet 的參數。

trans-unit.source: Without parameters, a "Get-Job" command gets all jobs in the current session.
trans-unit.target: 若未提供任何參數，"Get-Job" 命令會取得目前工作階段中的所有工作。

trans-unit.source: You can use the parameters of **Get-Job** to get particular jobs.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用的參數 **Get-job** 取得特定工作。

trans-unit.source: The job object that **Get-Job** returns contains useful information about the job, but it does not contain the job results.
trans-unit.target: 工作物件 **Get-job** 傳回包含實用資訊的工作，但它不包含工作結果。

trans-unit.source: To get the results, use the Receive-Job cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得的結果，請使用 Receive-job cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: A Windows PowerShell background job is a command that runs "in the background" without interacting with the current session.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 背景工作是不需與目前工作階段互動，即可在「背景中」執行的命令。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you use a background job to run a complex command that takes a long time to complete.
trans-unit.target: 通常，您會使用背景工作來執行複雜的命令，這類命令需要很長的時間才能完成。

trans-unit.source: For more information about background jobs in Windows PowerShell, see about_Jobs.
trans-unit.target: 如需 Windows PowerShell 中的背景工作的詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Jobs。

trans-unit.source: Beginning in Windows PowerShell 3.0, the **Get-Job** cmdlet also gets custom job types, such as workflow jobs and instances of scheduled jobs.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中，從 **Get-job** cmdlet 也可取得自訂工作類型，例如工作流程工作和排程工作的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: To find the job type of a job, use the **PSJobTypeName** property of the job.
trans-unit.target: 若要尋找工作的工作類型，請使用 **PSJobTypeName** 工作的屬性。

trans-unit.source: To enable **Get-Job** to get a custom job type, import the module that supports the custom job type into the session before running a **Get-Job** command, either by using the Import-Module cmdlet or by using or getting a cmdlet in the module.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用 **Get-job** 取得自訂工作類型的模組匯入支援工作階段之前執行的自訂工作類型， **Get-job** 命令，使用 Import-module cmdlet 或使用或 cmdlet 取得模組中。

trans-unit.source: For information about a particular custom job type, see the documentation of the custom job type feature.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關特定自訂工作類型的資訊，請參閱自訂工作類型功能的文件。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: This command gets all background jobs started in the current session.
trans-unit.target: 這個命令會取得目前工作階段中啟動的所有背景工作。

trans-unit.source: It does not include jobs created in other sessions, even if the jobs run on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 它不會包含在其他工作階段中建立的工作，即使這類工作是在本機電腦上執行也一樣。

trans-unit.source: These commands show how to get the instance ID of a job and then use it to stop a job.
trans-unit.target: 這些命令示範如何取得工作的執行個體識別碼，然後使用它來停止工作。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the name of a job, which is not unique, the instance ID is unique.
trans-unit.target: 與工作名稱 (這不是唯一的) 不同，執行個體識別碼是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: This command gets the jobs on the system that include a Get-Process command.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會取得系統上包含 Get-process 命令的工作。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the **Command** parameter of **Get-Job** to limit the jobs retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會使用 **命令** 參數 **Get-job** 來限制擷取的工作。

trans-unit.source: The command uses wildcard characters (*) to get jobs that include a **Get-Process** command anywhere within the command string.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會使用萬用字元 (*) 來取得工作，包括 **Get-process** 命令的命令字串內的任何位置。

trans-unit.source: Like the command in the previous example, this command gets the jobs on the system that include a Get-Process command.
trans-unit.target: 如上述範例中的命令，此命令會取得系統上包含 Get-process 命令的工作。

trans-unit.source: The command uses a pipeline operator (|) to send a string (in quotation marks) to the **Get-Job** cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 命令使用管線運算子 (|) 字串 （引號括住） 傳送至 **Get-job** 指令程式。

trans-unit.source: It is the equivalent of the previous command.
trans-unit.target: 它等同於前一個命令。

trans-unit.source: This command gets only those jobs that have been created but have not yet been started.
trans-unit.target: 這個命令只會取得已建立但尚未啟動的工作。

trans-unit.source: This includes jobs that are scheduled to run in the future and those not yet scheduled.
trans-unit.target: 這包括已排定在未來執行的工作以及尚未排程的工作。

trans-unit.source: This command gets all jobs that have job names beginning with "job".
trans-unit.target: 這個命令會取得工作名稱是以 "job" 開頭的所有工作。

trans-unit.source: Because "job\<number\>" is the default name for a job, this command gets all jobs that do not have an explicitly assigned name.
trans-unit.target: 因為 「 工作\<數目\>」 是預設名稱作業中，此命令會取得所有工作都不需要明確指派的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use **Get-Job** to get a job object, and then it shows how to use the job object to represent the job in a command.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例示範如何使用 **Get-job** 以取得工作物件，然後示範如何使用工作物件來代表命令中的工作。

trans-unit.source: This example demonstrates that the Get-Job cmdlet can get all of the jobs that were started in the current session, even if they were started by using different methods.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例示範 Get-Job Cmdlet 可取得所有已在目前工作階段中啟動的工作，即使它們是使用不同的方法啟動的。

trans-unit.source: This command shows how to use the job object that Get-Job returns to investigate why a job failed.
trans-unit.target: 這個命令示範如何使用 Get-Job 傳回的工作物件來調查工作失敗的原因。

trans-unit.source: It also shows how to get the child jobs of each job.
trans-unit.target: 它也會示範如何取得每個工作的子工作。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use the **Filter** parameter to get a workflow job.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例示範如何使用 **篩選** 參數，以取得工作流程工作。

trans-unit.source: The **Filter** parameter, introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0 is valid only on custom job types, such as workflow jobs and scheduled jobs.
trans-unit.target: **篩選** 參數，在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進適用於僅自訂工作類型，例如工作流程工作和排程的工作。

trans-unit.source: This example shows the effect of using the **IncludeChildJob** and **ChildJobState** parameters of the **Get-Job** cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 此範例顯示使用的效果 **IncludeChildJob** 和 **ChildJobState** 參數 **Get-job** 指令程式。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: -Command
trans-unit.target: -Command

trans-unit.source: Gets the jobs that include the specified command.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含指定命令的工作。

trans-unit.source: The default is all jobs.
trans-unit.target: 預設為所有工作。

trans-unit.source: Enter a command (as a string).
trans-unit.target: 以字串形式輸入命令。

trans-unit.source: You can use wildcards to specify a command pattern.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用萬用字元來指定命令模式。

trans-unit.source: -Filter
trans-unit.target: 篩選器

trans-unit.source: Gets jobs that satisfy all of the conditions established in the associated hash table.
trans-unit.target: 取得符合在相關聯雜湊表中建立之所有條件的工作。

trans-unit.source: Enter a hash table where the keys are job properties and the values are job property values.
trans-unit.target: 輸入索引鍵為工作屬性且值為工作屬性值的雜湊表。

trans-unit.source: This parameter works only on custom job types, such as workflow jobs and scheduled jobs.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數只適用於自訂工作類型，例如，工作流程工作和已排程的工作。

trans-unit.source: It does not work on standard background jobs, such as those created by using the Start-Job cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 它無法運作的標準背景工作，例如使用 Start-job cmdlet 建立的。

trans-unit.source: For information about support for this parameter, see the help topic for the job type.
trans-unit.target: 如需支援此參數的詳細資訊，請參閱工作類型的說明主題。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -Id
trans-unit.target: 識別碼

trans-unit.source: Gets only jobs with the specified IDs.
trans-unit.target: 只取得指定識別碼的工作。

trans-unit.source: The ID is an integer that uniquely identifies the job within the current session.
trans-unit.target: 識別碼是整數，可唯一識別目前工作階段中的工作。

trans-unit.source: It is easier to remember and to type than the instance ID, but it is unique only within the current session.
trans-unit.target: 與執行個體識別碼相比，它比較容易記住並輸入，但是它只有在目前的工作階段內是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: You can type one or more IDs (separated by commas).
trans-unit.target: 您可以輸入一個或多個識別碼 (以逗號分隔)。

trans-unit.source: To find the ID of a job, type "**Get-Job**" without parameters.
trans-unit.target: 若要尋找工作識別碼，請輸入"**Get-job**」 不含參數。

trans-unit.source: -IncludeChildJob
trans-unit.target: -IncludeChildJob

trans-unit.source: Returns child jobs, in addition to parent jobs.
trans-unit.target: 除了父系工作之外，還會傳回子工作。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is particularly useful for investigating workflow jobs, for which **Get-Job** returns a container parent job, and job failures, because the reason for the failure is saved in a property of the child job.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數就特別有用的調查工作流程工作 **Get-job** 傳回容器父系工作，與工作失敗，因為失敗的原因儲存在子工作的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -InstanceId
trans-unit.target: -執行個體識別碼

trans-unit.source: Gets jobs with the specified instance IDs.
trans-unit.target: 取得具有指定執行個體識別碼的工作。

trans-unit.source: The default is all jobs.
trans-unit.target: 預設為所有工作。

trans-unit.source: An instance ID is a GUID that uniquely identifies the job on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體識別碼是 GUID，可唯一識別電腦上的工作。

trans-unit.source: To find the instance ID of a job, use **Get-Job**.
trans-unit.target: 若要尋找工作的執行個體識別碼，請使用 **Get-job**。

trans-unit.source: -Name
trans-unit.target: -Name

trans-unit.source: Gets the job with the specified friendly names.
trans-unit.target: 取得具有指定好記名稱的工作。

trans-unit.source: Enter a job name, or use wildcard characters to enter a job name pattern.
trans-unit.target: 輸入工作名稱，或使用萬用字元來輸入工作名稱模式。

trans-unit.source: By default, **Get-Job** gets all jobs in the current session.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設， **Get-job** 取得目前工作階段中的所有工作。

trans-unit.source: -State
trans-unit.target: 狀態

trans-unit.source: Gets only jobs in the specified state.
trans-unit.target: 只取得指定狀態的工作。

trans-unit.source: Valid values are NotStarted, Running, Completed, Failed, Stopped, Blocked, Suspended, Disconnected, Suspending, Stopping.
trans-unit.target: 有效值為 NotStarted、 執行、 已完成、 失敗、 已停止、 已封鎖、 已擱置、 已中斷連線、 正在暫停、 停止。

trans-unit.source: By default, **Get-Job** gets all the jobs in the current session.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設， **Get-job** 取得目前工作階段中的所有工作。

trans-unit.source: For more information about job states, see "JobState Enumeration" in MSDN at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/system.management.automation.jobstate(v=vs.85).aspxhttp://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/system.management.automation.jobstate(v=vs.85).aspx
trans-unit.target: 工作狀態的詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN 中的 < JobState 列舉 >，網址 http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/system.management.automation.jobstate (v=vs.85).aspxhttp://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/system.management.automation.jobstate (vs.85

trans-unit.source: -After
trans-unit.target: 之後

trans-unit.source: Gets completed jobs that ended after the specified date and time.
trans-unit.target: 取得在指定日期和時間之後結束的已完成工作。

trans-unit.source: Enter a **DateTime** object, such as one returned by the Get-Date cmdlet or a string that can be converted to a **DateTime** object, such as "Dec 1, 2012 2:00 AM" or "11/06".
trans-unit.target: 輸入 **DateTime** 物件，例如 Get-date cmdlet 或可以轉換成字串由 **DateTime** 物件，例如"Dec 1，2012 2:00 AM"或"11/06"。

trans-unit.source: This parameter works only on custom job types, such as workflow jobs and scheduled jobs, that have an **EndTime** property.
trans-unit.target: 此參數只適用於自訂工作類型，例如工作流程工作和已排程的工作有 **EndTime** 屬性。

trans-unit.source: It does not work on standard background jobs, such as those created by using the Start-Job cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 它無法運作的標準背景工作，例如使用 Start-job cmdlet 建立的。

trans-unit.source: For information about support for this parameter, see the help topic for the job type.
trans-unit.target: 如需支援此參數的詳細資訊，請參閱工作類型的說明主題。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -Before
trans-unit.target: 之前

trans-unit.source: Gets completed jobs that ended before the specified date and time.
trans-unit.target: 取得在指定日期和時間之前結束的已完成工作。

trans-unit.source: Enter a **DateTime** object, such as one returned by the Get-Date cmdlet or a string that can be converted to a **DateTime** object, such as "Dec 1, 2012 2:00 AM" or "11/06".
trans-unit.target: 輸入 **DateTime** 物件，例如 Get-date cmdlet 或可以轉換成字串由 **DateTime** 物件，例如"Dec 1，2012 2:00 AM"或"11/06"。

trans-unit.source: This parameter works only on custom job types, such as workflow jobs and scheduled jobs, that have an **EndTime** property.
trans-unit.target: 此參數只適用於自訂工作類型，例如工作流程工作和已排程的工作有 **EndTime** 屬性。

trans-unit.source: It does not work on standard background jobs, such as those created by using the Start-Job cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 它無法運作的標準背景工作，例如使用 Start-job cmdlet 建立的。

trans-unit.source: For information about support for this parameter, see the help topic for the job type.
trans-unit.target: 如需支援此參數的詳細資訊，請參閱工作類型的說明主題。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -ChildJobState
trans-unit.target: -ChildJobState

trans-unit.source: Gets only the child jobs that have the specified state.
trans-unit.target: 只取得具有指定狀態的子工作。

trans-unit.source: Valid values are: **NotStarted**, **Running**, **Completed**, **Failed**, **Stopped**, **Blocked**, **Suspended**, **Disconnected**, **Suspending**, and **Stopping**.
trans-unit.target: 有效值為︰ **NotStarted**, ，**執行**, ，**已完成**, ，**失敗**, ，**已停止**, ，**已封鎖**, ，**Suspended**, ，**已中斷連接**, ，**正在暫停**, ，和 **停止**。

trans-unit.source: By default, **Get-Job** does not get child jobs.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設， **Get-job** 無法取得子工作。

trans-unit.source: With the **IncludeChildJob** parameter, **Get-Job** gets all child jobs.
trans-unit.target: 使用 **IncludeChildJob** 參數， **Get-job** 取得所有子工作。

trans-unit.source: If you use the **ChildJobState** parameter, the **IncludeChildJob** parameter has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用 **ChildJobState** 參數， **IncludeChildJob** 參數沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -HasMoreData
trans-unit.target: -HasMoreData

trans-unit.source: Gets only jobs with the specified **HasMoreData** property value.
trans-unit.target: 只取得具有指定之工作 **HasMoreData** 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The **HasMoreData** property indicates whether all job results have been received in the current session.
trans-unit.target: **HasMoreData** 屬性會指出所有工作結果是否已經接收都到目前工作階段中。

trans-unit.source: To get jobs that have more results, type `-HaveMoreData:true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得工作有更多結果，請輸入 `-HaveMoreData:true`。

trans-unit.source: To get jobs that do not have more results, type `-HaveMoreData:$false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得不需要更多結果的工作，請輸入 `-HaveMoreData:$false`。

trans-unit.source: To get the results of a job, use the Receive-Job cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得工作的結果，請使用 Receive-job cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: When you use the **Receive-Job** cmdlet, it deletes from its in-memory (session-specific) storage the results that it returned.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用 **Receive-job** 指令程式，它會刪除其儲存在記憶體 （工作階段特定） 從它所傳回的結果。

trans-unit.source: When it has returned all results of the job in the current session, it sets the value of the **HasMoreData** property of the job to False ($false) to indicate that it has no more results for the job in the current session.
trans-unit.target: 當它已在目前工作階段中傳回所有工作的結果時，它會將設定的值 **HasMoreData** 屬性為 False ($false) 來表示它目前的工作階段中有更多作業結果的工作。

trans-unit.source: Use the **Keep** parameter of **Receive-Job** to prevent **Receive-Job** from deleting results and changing the value of the **HasMoreData** property.
trans-unit.target: 使用 **保留** 參數 **Receive-job** 防止 **Receive-job** 刪除結果以及變更的值 **HasMoreData** 屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, type "`Get-Help Receive-Job`".
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請輸入"`Get-Help Receive-Job`"。

trans-unit.source: The **HasMoreData** property is specific to the current session.
trans-unit.target: **HasMoreData** 是目前的工作階段特定的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If results for a custom job type are saved outside of the session, such as the scheduled job type, which saves job results on disk, you can use the **Receive-Job** cmdlet in a different session to get the job results again, even if the value of **HasMoreData** is false.
trans-unit.target: 如果自訂工作類型的結果都會儲存的工作階段之外，例如排程的工作類型，將工作結果儲存在磁碟上，您可以使用 **Receive-job** 指令程式在不同的工作階段，以取得工作結果一次，即使值 **HasMoreData** 為 false。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the help topics for the custom job type.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱自訂工作類型的說明主題。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: -Newest
trans-unit.target: -最新

trans-unit.source: Gets the jobs that ended most recently.
trans-unit.target: 取得最近結束的工作。

trans-unit.source: Enter the number of jobs to return.
trans-unit.target: 輸入要傳回的工作數目。

trans-unit.source: The **Newest** parameter does not sort or return the newest jobs in end-time order.
trans-unit.target: **最新** 參數不會排序或結束時間順序傳回最新的作業。

trans-unit.source: To sort the output, use the Sort-Object cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要排序輸出，請使用 Sort-object cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此參數是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸入

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: You cannot pipe input to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您無法使用管線傳送輸入至此 Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸出

trans-unit.source: System.Management.Automation.RemotingJob
trans-unit.target: System.Management.Automation.RemotingJob

trans-unit.source: **Get-Job** returns objects that represent the jobs in the session.
trans-unit.target: **Get-job** 傳回物件，代表工作階段中的工作。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 附註

trans-unit.source: The **PSJobTypeName** property of jobs indicates the job type of the job.
trans-unit.target: **PSJobTypeName** 工作的屬性會指出工作的工作類型。

trans-unit.source: The property value is determined by the job type author.
trans-unit.target: 屬性值是由工作類型作者所決定。

trans-unit.source: The following list shows common job types.
trans-unit.target: 下列清單顯示常見的工作類型。

trans-unit.source: **BackgroundJob**: Local job started by using the Start-Job cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: **BackgroundJob**︰ 使用 Start-job cmdlet 來啟動本機作業。

trans-unit.source: **RemoteJob**: Job started in a PSSession by using the **AsJob** parameter of the Invoke-Command cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: **RemoteJob**︰ 啟動工作在 PSSession 中使用 **AsJob** Invoke-command cmdlet 的參數。

trans-unit.source: **PSWorkflowJob**: Job started by using the **AsJob** common parameter of workflows.
trans-unit.target: **PSWorkflowJob**︰ 啟動工作使用 **AsJob** 的工作流程一般參數。

trans-unit.target: 相關的連結
